meanings.sent1: The unwakened child slept peacefully through the night.
meanings.sent2: She felt unwakened and groggy after oversleeping.
meanings.sent3: The unwakened alarm clock failed to rouse him from his slumber.
meanings.sent4: The unwakened city slowly stirred to life as the sun rose.
meanings.sent5: The unwakened forest was still and quiet in the early morning light.

meanings.sent1: The unwakened computer screen remained blank.
meanings.sent2: His unwakened interest in the topic showed in his lack of questions.
meanings.sent3: The unwakened car engine refused to start on the cold morning.
meanings.sent4: Her unwakened curiosity suddenly sparked when she saw the mysterious package.
meanings.sent5: The unwakened volcano lay dormant for centuries before erupting.

meanings.sent1: The unwakened students were oblivious to the surprise test.
meanings.sent2: His unwakened memory failed to recall the events of that day.
meanings.sent3: The unwakened puppy innocently chewed on the slipper.
meanings.sent4: Her unwakened intuition finally kicked in, warning her of danger.
meanings.sent5: The unwakened mind slowly absorbed the new information.
